item.description:
Time: 5.30pm - 8pm
Place: 116 Crown, downtown New Haven

We're usually at a table in the back but are sometimes up front by the bar. If you're not sure where to go, ask the hostess or bartender. If you are the first person, hang around for a bit, the meetup is casual and people will straggle in between 5:30 and 6:30.

Please RSVP in Advance!

Please also note that we do not ever officially cancel the meetup (for those who live downtown or close by), but in instances of bad weather, if you do come, please don't expect our full crowd!
item.name: Monthly Networking Event
